resources.string: Check the need to package the log type,click on the button of Package Logs to pack log, the target path：%1$s
The logs are packing,please wait a few minutes.
Tip:If need to set the size of a single log file,please turn off the log switch.
Tip：if need to delete the previous log,please first turn off the log switch and click the following button to delete the log.
Deleting Android logs,please wait a few minutes.
Delete the all previous android log?
Deleting Modem logs,please wait a few minutes
Delete the all previous modem log?
Deleting bluetooth logs,please wait a few minutes
Delete the all previous bluetooth log?
The next boot whether to start Log?
Tip:If need to set the configuration of modem log,please turn off the log switch.
Max size of each log file
Whether to package all selected logs?

"Start mode: dial pad input *#*#98284#*#*
This application is as follows:
1.Android log
2.Modem log
3.TcpDump Log
4.Node Log
5.Package Logs
6.Upload Logs
Note: Each project function may be inconsistent, please display the information on the home page"

"Start mode: Click on the desktop icon to enter
This application is as follows:
1.Android log
2.Package Logs
3.Upload Logs
Note: Each project function may be inconsistent, please display the information on the home page"
The default free space on the storage device is less than 200M,please clean the space and try again.
Left to right are: appName packageName versionName
Attachment has the same name file
"Precondition: Steps: Expect Result: Result: Reference Machine: Marks:"
Whether to delete the selected log?
Whether to upload the just packed log?
No log, please click the button below to package the existing log.
The log has been uploaded, whether to re-upload?
The current network is data connection, whether the upload log?
Upload exception, please try again later!
Text input is empty, please check and then re-enter and then upload
There is currently no network, please connect wlan or data ,and try again
The log is uploading, please wait for the upload to complete and try again!
The following is a detailed description of this log:
There is no tcpdump file in the phone, can not crawl tcpdump log, please confirm the version.
The Nodes are separated by enter
The Cmd are separated by enter
Tip:If need to set the size or count of a single log file,please turn off the log switch.
